name: Investigate list_dir/read_file Tool Timeouts
description: Initial investigation revealed `list_dir` and `read_file` tools time out (5s) accessing specific directories (`src/dreamos/core/agents/`, `src/dreamos/tools/functional/`), while `grep_search` succeeds. This points to a likely issue within the `list_dir`/`read_file` tool implementations (e.g., metadata handling, recursion, symlinks) rather than a general filesystem block. Task scope updated: Analyze the implementation of `list_dir` and `read_file` tools, compare their directory traversal logic to `grep_search` (ripgrep), and identify the root cause of the timeouts in affected directories.
